Pure Encapsulations

Brands Pure Encapsulations
Pure Encapsulations was founded to formulate and manufacture the highest quality line of supplements available. Distributed worldwide, Pure Encapsulations products contain only the highest quality ingredients in their most bioavailable forms and are formulated to provide strengths and dosing consistent with clinical experience and double-blind, placebo-controlled studies. Pure Encapsulations supplements are hypoallergenic. All two-piece capsules are hypoallergenic and vegetarian.There are absolutely no added coatings, binders, shellacs, artificial flavors, artificial sweeteners or colors, fragrance or excipients in our products that would disrupt or diminish the bioavailability of any of our ingredients. Pure Encapsulations does not use magnesium stearate in any of their formulas. Their products also do not contain wheat, gluten, nuts, egg, preservatives or hydrogenated oils. Well.ca's selection of Pure Encapsulations includes their popular: EPA/DHA Essentials, B12 5000 Liquid and Probiotic 50B.
